name: DIEZEL
description:
"It's fun to play punk rock because it's very physical... it's very direct." 

 - Joe Strummer

DIEZEL is a bookmark-sized anti-capitalist semi-tactical rock-and-roll science-fiction rpg.

1. Gather some friends

2. Get at least 2 six-sided dice, something to write with, and something to write on

3. Grab a device that can play music

And that's it! From there, you can follow, disregard, and make up more rules as you go. Have fun!
